pages.text: $(l)Clay$() is a block that can be $(l:gameplay/smelting)smelted$() to form $(l:building/terracotta)terracotta$() and is usually found in locations where $(l:building/sand)sand$() or $(l:building/dirt)dirt$() and water are present, most commonly appearing in shallow water, especially along the coast of island groups. When mined, four $(l:misc/clay_ball)clay balls$() will drop.
